evidence.claim: NICA implements HIPAA-compliant data handling to safeguard patient information.
NICA utilizes AWS cloud services for its infrastructure, ensuring scalability and reliability.
The integration of FHIR standards allows seamless data exchange with health systems.
NICA supports X12 transaction sets for healthcare claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: NICA utilizes HIPAA and X12, indicating alignment with API-driven healthcare data exchange.
